text: Cusani Confalonieri in 1915 Luigi Girolamo Cusani-Confalonieri (April 15, 1861 – March 10, 1934), was the Ambassador of Italy to the United States from November 1, 1910 to May 29, 1914 when he was replaced by Vincenzo Macchi Di Cellere. He was the Ambassador of Italy to Japan from April 9, 1917 to February 17, 1920. ==References== Category:Ambassadors of Italy to the United States Category:Ambassadors of Italy to Japan Category:1861 births Category:1934 deaths
title: Luigi Girolamo Cusani-Confalonieri
